title: Blogify

title: Plan Your Future

title: ChatApp
description: A lightweight chat application implemented in JavaScript using WebSockets to enable real-time bidirectional communication. Each client maintains an open WebSocket connection with the server. Messages sent by a user are received by the server and broadcast to every connected client, allowing immediate updates in the chat interface.

title: Collaboration Board
description: A real-time collaborative whiteboard implemented in JavaScript using WebSockets for bidirectional communication. The client captures drawing events from the canvas and sends them to the server, which then broadcasts the events to all connected users. This makes the shared board update immediately across all sessions.
